title: Equilibrium: The First Signal
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate-cover edition for ASIN B01BLNFMG6 Seven strangers. One connection. A world beyond their own. And a presence so sinister it threatens to distort the balance between good and evil. Can they conquer the darkness? Or will it be too late when the shrill scream of the First Signal is released?
author: E.D. Lala
